    public class CLIParser.ValidatedInput
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a set of validated and organized inputs.
    Author:
    Tobias Marstaller

      • asProperties

        public java.util.Properties asProperties()
        Returns an instance of Properties that holds all values of the flags and options known by this input. The boolean state of flags will be represented by the strings "true" and "false"
        Returns:
        An instance of Properties that holds all values of the flags and options known by this input.

      • writeTo

        public void writeTo(java.util.Properties to)
        Writes all values of the flags and options known by this input to an instance of Properties. The boolean state of flags will be represented by the strings "true" and "false"
